scripts.build: browserify . -s humbleLocalStorage > dist/humble-localstorage.js && uglifyjs dist/humble-localstorage.js -mc > dist/humble-localstorage.min.js
scripts.predeploy: git config user.name "Travis-CI" && git config user.email "deploy@travis-ci.org" && git remote add deploy "https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/gr2m/humble-localstorage.git" > /dev/null 2>&1
scripts.deploy: git branch -f gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r docs/* . && git reset --hard origin/master && git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'gh-pages update' && git push deploy gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.postpublish: semantic-release post && npm run docs && npm run deploy
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-unit && npm run test-e2e
